review: I purchased this when there was a deal for $19 for Prime Members as a pre-order. We are highly considering getting rid of our satellite when our contract comes due in the next month so I figured this would be an easy option to watch shows, for our kids to have their cartoons and for us to be able to listen to music (which is what we use our DirecTV for currently). This was super easy to set up. Took awhile for it to all go through but after setting it up it's been working perfectly.Before we bought this we were having to use a HDMI cable to hook up our Kindle whenever we wanted to watch something. This is SO easy to use. It just stays hooked into our TV. We switch the input and there is all of our Amazon Prime shows we love plus the apps we've downloaded.I couldn't be happier with this purchase and think it's a good investment if you are constantly having to figure out how to watch your Prime shows or movies on your TV.
author: MOMMATOTHREE
